project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Introduction & Context Setting
sections.goal: Establish the candidate's understanding of the Helios Datalake project, their role, and initial high-level architecture familiarity.
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your role and responsibilities in the Helios Datalake project?
What are the primary data sources and ingestion patterns used in Helios?
How do you ensure alignment with Novereon Systems' values in your day-to-day work?

sections.title: Technical Deep Dive on ELT Pipeline
sections.goal: Assess knowledge of ELT processes, dbt modeling, and integration with Kafka ingestion layers.
sample_questions: Walk me through the ingestion flow from Kafka to Snowflake in Helios.
How do you manage schema evolution while maintaining data quality?
What is the role of the RB-ING-042 Ingestion Failover Runbook in your operational model?

sections.title: Data Lineage & Governance
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee ensures traceability, compliance, and meets SLA-HEL-01 requirements.
sample_questions: How do you track data lineage from source systems to modeled datasets?
What steps are taken to ensure compliance with POL-SEC-001 Least Privilege & JIT Access?
How do you use lineage data to support root-cause analysis during incidents?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Explore interactions between Helios Datalake and other Novereon projects (e.g., Nimbus Observability, Quasar Billing).
sample_questions: Can you describe any dependencies between Helios and the Quasar Billing system?
How do you integrate observability signals from Nimbus into Helios' operational monitoring?
What challenges arise from cross-project schema dependencies?

sections.title: Scaling & Performance Optimization
sections.goal: Evaluate strategies for scaling pipelines, optimizing dbt models, and meeting SLOs.
sample_questions: What partitioning strategies have you implemented, and how did RFC-1287 influence them?
How do you balance cost efficiency with performance in large-scale batch loads?
What are your approaches to handling backpressure from Kafka topics?

sections.title: Incident Management & Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Assess experience with runbooks, postmortems, and proactive improvements.
sample_questions: Describe a major ingestion incident and how you applied RB-ING-042 to resolve it.
What metrics do you track post-incident to measure recovery effectiveness?
How do you feed incident learnings back into pipeline design?

sections.title: Decision-Making & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee makes technical tradeoffs under constraints and risk.
sample_questions: In the context of Helios, how do you decide between batch and streaming ingestion for a new source?
Can you give an example where you had to limit the BLAST_RADIUS of a change?
How do you weigh short-term delivery pressures against long-term maintainability?

sections.title: Wrap-Up & Candidate Questions
sections.goal: Allow the interviewee to clarify any points and ask their own questions about the role or project.
sample_questions: Is there anything you'd like to add about your approach to data engineering?
Do you have any questions about the Helios Datalake roadmap?
What support would you need to be successful in this role?
